sentence: The image appears to be a screenshot of a mobile app interface, likely for a train service.
sentence_cn: 该图片看起来是一张移动应用程序界面的截图，可能用于火车服务。

sentence: 1. Top Bar: Features a red background with icons resembling notification, signal strength, and battery indicators, along with the time displayed as 11:30.
sentence_cn: 1. 顶部栏：背景为红色，带有类似通知、信号强度和电池指示器的图标，时间显示为 11:30。

sentence: 2. Title: Reads "Connections" in white text on a red background.
sentence_cn: 2. 标题：红色背景上用白色文字写着“连接”。

sentence: There's a symbol on the right that may represent a train logo.
sentence_cn: 右边有一个符号可能代表火车标志。

sentence: 3. From Section: Displays "From Luzern", indicating the departure point for the train search.
sentence_cn: 3. 出发区段：显示“从卢塞恩出发”，表示火车搜索的出发地。

sentence: - Icon on the right side looks like a refresh or sync button.
sentence_cn: - 右侧的图标看起来像刷新或同步按钮。

sentence: - A percentage symbol in a circle overlays a part of the app, likely highlighting a feature related to discounts or offers.
sentence_cn: - 圆圈内的百分比符号覆盖了应用程序的一部分，可能突出显示与折扣或优惠相关的功能。

sentence: - Shows a connection going in the "Direction Gen¨¨ve-A¨¦roport" with timing and platform details.
sentence_cn: - 显示“日内瓦-机场方向”的连接以及时间和平台详情。
- 显示另一个连接“奥尔滕方向”。

sentence: - Text below the app screenshot reads: "Overview of supersaver tickets", in red bold font.
sentence_cn: - 应用程序截图下方的文字为：“超级优惠票概览”，以红色粗体字体显示。

sentence: - Additional text explains, "For departures at least one hour after search time, a percent sign shows available supersaver tickets."
sentence_cn: - 附加文字解释道，“对于搜索时间后至少一小时出发的航班，百分号表示有可用的超级优惠票。”
words: For departures at least one hour after search time, a percent sign shows available supersaver tickets.

sentence: - A large red "Continue" button below the explanatory text.
sentence_cn: - 说明文字下方有一个大的红色“继续”按钮。

sentence: - A "Skip tutorial" option, allowing users to bypass further instructions.
sentence_cn: - “跳过教程”选项，允许用户绕过进一步的说明。

sentence: 8. Progress Indicator: A series of circles near the top suggests it's part of a multi-step tutorial or guide.
sentence_cn: 8. 进度指示器：顶部附近的一系列圆圈表示它是多步骤教程或指南的一部分。

sentence: The overall design is clean, with a focus on user navigation and displaying key train connections.
sentence_cn: 整体设计简洁，注重用户导航并显示主要的火车连接。
